ingredients.ingredient: 12 each fresh oysters in shells, rinsed and scrubbed clean

cookingTips: Scrub oyster shells thoroughly under cold water before smoking to remove sand and debris
Smoke at 225Â°F for 30-45 minutes until oysters open slightly
Use mild wood chips like apple or cherry to avoid overpowering delicate oyster flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What smoking temperature and duration would you recommend for opening oysters while preserving their briny flavor?
